title: Bug 121687: Exception throws when exporting data in a table that is inside a grid cell
description: An exception is thrown when exporting data in a table that is inside a grid cell.
OB: An exception is thrown when trying to export data from a table that is inside a grid cell.
EB: The data in the table should be successfully exported without any exceptions being thrown.
SR:
To reproduce:
1. Open the application and navigate to the page with the grid.
2. Expand a grid cell to reveal a table inside.
3. Try to export the data from the table.
4. Note that an exception is thrown during the export process.
